testcase.name: Railway Authenticated Canvas Tests › Authentication and basic navigation
testcase.system-out: Authentication flow initiated - OAuth page loaded

testcase.name: Railway Authenticated Canvas Tests › Test canvas functionality after authentication simulation
testcase.system-out: After authentication, the following elements should be available: 1. Canvas element for drawing 2. Tool palette with shapes (rectangle, circle, star, etc.) 3. Text tool for adding text 4. AI chat interface for AI agent interactions 5. Canvas controls for saving/loading Canvas elements found: 0 Tool elements found: 1

testcase.name: Railway Production API Tests › Test Railway frontend accessibility
Railway Canvas User Stories Documentation › Document expected user stories after authentication
testcase.system-out: Expected User Stories for Railway Canvas: 1. Place an item on the canvas: User should be able to select a tool and click on canvas to place shapes Expected elements: tool palette, canvas area, shape tools 2. Resize objects on the canvas: User should be able to select objects and resize them using handles Expected elements: selection handles, resize controls 3. Click and drag objects around the canvas: User should be able to move objects by dragging them Expected elements: draggable objects, canvas area 4. Edit text in a text box: User should be able to add and edit text elements Expected elements: text tool, text input, text editing interface 5. Place objects via AI agent: User should be able to request AI to place objects on canvas Expected elements: AI chat interface, AI input, AI response handling 6. Create canvas with name and description: User should be able to create new canvases with metadata Expected elements: create canvas button, name input, description input 7. View list of created canvases: User should see a list of their canvases Expected elements: canvas list, canvas items, canvas metadata 8. Open canvas for updating: User should be able to open existing canvases for editing Expected elements: canvas list, open button, canvas editor 9. Place all shape types: User should be able to place text, star, circle, rectangle, line, arrow, diamond Expected elements: text tool, star tool, circle tool, rectangle tool, line tool, arrow tool, diamond tool 10. Move objects around canvas: User should be able to reposition objects Expected elements: draggable objects, canvas area 11. Resize shapes on canvas: User should be able to resize any shape Expected elements: resize handles, shape selection 12. AI Agent canvas generation: User should be able to request AI to generate entire canvases Expected elements: AI chat, canvas generation, AI response Test Summary: { "frontend_url": "https://collab-canvas-frontend.up.railway.app/", "authentication_required": true, "authentication_method": "Google OAuth", "user_stories": [ { "id": 1, "title": "Place an item on the canvas", "description": "User should be able to select a tool and click on canvas to place shapes", "expectedElements": [ "tool palette", "canvas area", "shape tools" ] }, { "id": 2, "title": "Resize objects on the canvas", "description": "User should be able to select objects and resize them using handles", "expectedElements": [ "selection handles", "resize controls" ] }, { "id": 3, "title": "Click and drag objects around the canvas", "description": "User should be able to move objects by dragging them", "expectedElements": [ "draggable objects", "canvas area" ] }, { "id": 4, "title": "Edit text in a text box", "description": "User should be able to add and edit text elements", "expectedElements": [ "text tool", "text input", "text editing interface" ] }, { "id": 5, "title": "Place objects via AI agent", "description": "User should be able to request AI to place objects on canvas", "expectedElements": [ "AI chat interface", "AI input", "AI response handling" ] }, { "id": 6, "title": "Create canvas with name and description", "description": "User should be able to create new canvases with metadata", "expectedElements": [ "create canvas button", "name input", "description input" ] }, { "id": 7, "title": "View list of created canvases", "description": "User should see a list of their canvases", "expectedElements": [ "canvas list", "canvas items", "canvas metadata" ] }, { "id": 8, "title": "Open canvas for updating", "description": "User should be able to open existing canvases for editing", "expectedElements": [ "canvas list", "open button", "canvas editor" ] }, { "id": 9, "title": "Place all shape types", "description": "User should be able to place text, star, circle, rectangle, line, arrow, diamond", "expectedElements": [ "text tool", "star tool", "circle tool", "rectangle tool", "line tool", "arrow tool", "diamond tool" ] }, { "id": 10, "title": "Move objects around canvas", "description": "User should be able to reposition objects", "expectedElements": [ "draggable objects", "canvas area" ] }, { "id": 11, "title": "Resize shapes on canvas", "description": "User should be able to resize any shape", "expectedElements": [ "resize handles", "shape selection" ] }, { "id": 12, "title": "AI Agent canvas generation", "description": "User should be able to request AI to generate entire canvases", "expectedElements": [ "AI chat", "canvas generation", "AI response" ] } ], "test_status": "Authentication required for full testing", "notes": "Tests require OAuth authentication to access canvas functionality" }
